title: Sylvia, Fran and Joy

description: Three young women voice their feelings about the role of wife-mother-housekeeper. Sylvia shares responsibilities with her husband domestically and as a wage-earner; Fran is in a state of transition having recently left her husband; and Joy is the traditionalist who seemingly accepts her role without question.
